snippet: The Hall of Fame trainer Bob Baffert does not have a Derby contender, and the attention he has drawn has not been friendly. The deaths of horses he trained are under investigation.
lead_paragraph: The Hall of Fame trainer Bob Baffert does not have a Derby contender, and the attention he has drawn has not been friendly. The deaths of horses he trained are under investigation.

headline.seo: Kentucky Derby — Limelight Doesn’t Fall on Bob Baffert
headline.main: Derby Limelight Doesn’t Fall on Baffert
headline.print_headline: Derby Limelight Doesn’t Fall on Baffert
